info.title: Prometheus-X Catalog API
info.description: A component to manage and browse ecosystems, service offerings and data resources on the catalog.

tags.name: Data Resources
tags.description: Endpoints to manage data assets & resources

tags.name: Negotiation
tags.description: Endpoints related to management of negotiation on service offerings

tags.name: Representations
tags.description: Endpoints related to management of representation on data resource and software resource

get.summary: Retrieves Data resources with pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: offeredBy
parameters.description: Filter by Participant IDs offering the data (comma-separated)

post.summary: Creates a new data resource for the authenticated participant

201.description: Successful response with the created Data Resource

get.summary: Retrieves a single Data resource by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Data resource to retrieve

200.description: Successful response with the Data resource

put.summary: Updates a data resource by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Data resource to update

200.description: Successful response with the updated Data resource

delete.summary: Deletes a data resource by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Data resource to delete

200.description: Successful response with the deleted Data offering

get.summary: Retrieves Data resources of the logged in user

200.description: Successful response with the Data resources

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: offeredBy
parameters.description: Filter by Participant IDs offering the data (comma-separated)

200.description: Successful response with the updated Software resource

delete.summary: Deletes a Software resource by its ID

parameters.description: ID of the Software resource to delete

200.description: Successful response with the deleted Software offering

get.summary: Retrieves Software resources of the logged in user

200.description: Successful response with the Software resources

parameters.name: page

parameters.name: offeredBy

participantName.description: Name of the Participant / Organization to sign up

get.summary: Get My Exchange Configurations
Get Exchange Configuration by ID
Retrieves ecosystems with pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: offeredBy
parameters.description: Filter by Participant IDs included in Ecosystems (comma-separated)

post.summary: Creates a new Ecosystem with the authenticated participant as orchestrator

201.description: Successful response with the created Ecosystem

get.summary: Retrieves a single Ecosystem by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Ecosystem to retrieve

put.summary: Updates a Ecosystem by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Ecosystem to update

200.description: Successful response with the updated Ecosystem

delete.summary: Deletes a Ecosystem by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Ecosystem to delete

200.description: Successful response with the deleted Ecosystem

get.summary: Retrieves Ecosystems of the logged in user
Retrieves invitations of the logged in user to ecosystems
Retrieves invitations of the ecosystem

post.summary: Create an invitation to an ecosystem

post.description: Accepts an invitation to an ecosystem
Denies an invitation to an ecosystem
Creates a request to join an ecosystem

put.description: Authorizes a join request made to an ecosystem
Rejects a join request made to an ecosystem
Configure the offerings for a participant in an ecosystem

get.description: Retrieve contract for the ecosystem. The format of the contract is defined in the Prometheus-X Contract Manager repository

post.description: Create a contract for the ecosystem. This endpoint is only used if an ecosystem was created and the contract auto-generation failed.
Apply orchestrator signature on the ecosystem.
Apply participant signature on the ecosystem.

post.summary: Creates a new Representation for the authenticated participant

201.description: Successful response with the created Representation

get.summary: Retrieves a single Representation by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Representation to retrieve

put.summary: Updates a representation by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the representation to update

200.description: Successful response with the updated Representation

delete.summary: Deletes a Representation by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Representation to delete

200.description: Successful response with the deleted Representation

post.summary: Creates a new infrastructure service for the authenticated participant

201.description: Successful response with the created Infrastructure Service

get.summary: Retrieves Infrastructure services with pagination

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return per page

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page number for pagination

parameters.name: providedBy
parameters.description: Filter by provider ID

201.description: Successful response with the created draft Infrastructure Service

get.summary: Retrieves Infrastructure services of the logged in user

200.description: Successful response with the Infrastructure services

get.summary: Retrieves a single Infrastructure service by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Infrastructure service to retrieve

parameters.name: populated
parameters.description: Whether to populate related fields

200.description: Successful response with the Infrastructure service

put.summary: Updates an Infrastructure service by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Infrastructure service to update

200.description: Successful response with the updated Infrastructure service

delete.summary: Deletes an Infrastructure service by its ID

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the Infrastructure service to delete

get.summary: Retrieves Infrastructure services for a specific participant

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the participant

200.description: Successful response with the Infrastructure services

post.summary: Add infrastructure services to an ecosystem

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the ecosystem

200.description: Infrastructure services successfully added to ecosystem

post.summary: Apply infrastructure provider signature on the ecosystem

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the ecosystem

post.summary: Add a data processing chain to an ecosystem

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the ecosystem

resource.description: ID of the service offering or infrastructure service

put.summary: Update a data processing chain in an ecosystem

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the ecosystem

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: ID of the data processing chain

resource.description: ID of the service offering or infrastructure service

delete.summary: Delete a data processing chain from an ecosystem

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the ecosystem

parameters.name: chainId
parameters.description: ID of the data processing chain to delete

providedBy.description: The provider of the software resource

name.description: The name of the software resource

description.description: A description of the software resource

category.description: The category of the software resource

locationAddress.description: List of location addresses with country codes

name.description: The name of the service offering

providedBy.description: The provider of the service offering

termsAndConditions.description: Terms and conditions of the service offering

dataAccountExport.description: List of data account export configurations

consumer.description: The consumer in the exchange configuration

provider.description: The provider in the exchange configuration

ruleId.description: The rule ID for provider policies
The rule ID for consumer policies

contract.description: The contract associated with the exchange

ruleId.description: Rule UID of the policy to configure on the service offering

values.description: The differend values of the policy to configure based on the rule's requiredFields
